sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"住处"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: lodging, accommodation, apartment, flae, quarters, suite
means: lodging ： 常用lodgins,指临时租借的房间或宿舍。
种居住住所，一般指暂时下榻之地。
apartment ： 通常指占用或居住时间较长的成套房间，在美国比较常用。
flat ： 多用于英国、澳大利亚和新西兰。指同一层建筑物上组成一个居住单元的几个房间。
quarters ： 指某一部分人集中的居住区。
suite ： 可泛指任何设备完善的一套房间，但多指包括起居室、卧室和浴室的陈设较豪华的套间。

sentence.Network_en: The master bedroom has its own en suite bathroom.
sentence.Network_cn: 主卧室带有独立卫生间。

sentence.Network_en: The last chords of the suite build to a crescendo.
sentence.Network_cn: 组曲的最后和音部分渐入高潮。

sentence.Network_en: I suggest we fit you up with an office suite.
sentence.Network_cn: 我建议我们给你配备一间办公套房。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普吉岛中英泰常用词汇对照表（非常实用） ... 空房 vacant room 套房 suite 旅馆大厅 lobby.
音乐常识 - 游仙的日志 - 网易博客 ... 装饰音（ ornaments） 组曲（ suite） 声带 vocal cord，vocal band.
五星级酒店英语大全!_百度文库 ... shower 淋浴 suite （一套）房间 deluxe 豪华的.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... suit vt. 适合 suite n. 套间；组曲 suitable a. 合适的，适宜的.

list.abs: 首页-窈窕淑女精品女装店-淘宝网 ... 连衣裙（ Dresses） 套装（ Suit） 连体裤（ jumpsuits）.
首页-【废墟】私家.Ruins。-淘宝网 ... 配饰 Deserve to 西装 SUIT 皮衣 FUR.
有关服装面料的英文单词_百度知道 ... style line 款式条 suiting 西装料 sun exposure test 日晒测试.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French, from Anglo-Norman French siwte (see suit)

entry.def: A suite is a set of rooms in a hotel or other building.

example.ex: They had a fabulous time during their week in a suite at the Paris Hilton.
example.tran: 他们在巴黎希尔顿酒店的套房里度过了非常愉快的一周。

entry.def: A suite is a set of matching armchairs and a sofa.
A bathroom suite is a matching bath, washbasin, and toilet.

means.word_mean: 1. a musical composition of several movements only loosely connected
2. apartment consisting of a series of connected rooms used as a living unit (as in a hotel)
3. the group following and attending to some important person

auth_sentence.content: There are five en suite rooms with period furnishings.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are five en suite rooms with period furnishings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are five en suite rooms with period furnishings.

auth_sentence.content: Two of the ten bedrooms are not en suite.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two of the ten bedrooms are not en suite.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two of the ten bedrooms are not en suite.

auth_sentence.content: Each also has an en suite shower and loo.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each also has an en suite shower and loo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each also has an en suite shower and loo.

sentences.en: She has a suite of rooms in the hotel.
sentences.cn: 她在那家旅馆有一套房间。

sentences.en: That is a nice suite of furniture.

jushi.english: It's a suite of software development tools.
jushi.chinese: 这是一套软件开发工具。

jushi.english: That is a nice suite of furniture.
The suite consisted of four separate rooms.
jushi.chinese: 这间套房由四个单间组成。
